heading: HB02650
0: AN ACT PROVIDING INSURANCE BENEFITS TO BARANGAY TANODS AND INCREASING THE AMOUNT OF COVERAGE OF INSURANCE BENEFITS OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS, AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE, REPUBLIC ACT NO. 6942 AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02650
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING INSURANCE BENEFITS TO BARANGAY TANODS AND INCREASING THE AMOUNT OF COVERAGE OF INSURANCE BENEFITS OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS, AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE, REPUBLIC ACT NO. 6942 AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
